Graphic Device
[Halos GDI]

device independent implementation of drawing functions. functions are called by GDI API. Hardware dependent code is called through the graphics hardware interface More...

Detailed Description

device independent implementation of drawing functions. functions are called by GDI API. Hardware dependent code is called through the graphics hardware interface

Note:
...
Author:
momo
Version:
0.0.0.1
